title: Vertex Calculator for Parabola (Standard, Vertex, Intercept Form) | CalcDomain

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 1. X-coordinate ($h$): $$h = \frac{-b}{2a}$$ 2. Y-coordinate ($k$): $$k = f(h) = a(h)^2 + b(h) + c$$

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 1. X-coordinate ($h$): $$h = \frac{p + q}{2}$$ 2. Y-coordinate ($k$): $$k = f(h) = a(h - p)(h - q)$$
